Metadata.title: NexaFlow AI | Intelligent Automation for Your Business
Metadata.description: We transform your business with artificial intelligence. Process automation, chatbots, smart CRM and more. 10x your operations.
Metadata.keywords: AI automation, artificial intelligence business, AI chatbot, smart CRM, AI audit

Hero.headline: Supercharge your business
Hero.subheadline: We automate processes, implement AI tools and 10x your results. Your AI technology team, one click away.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: AI solutions designed for every area of your business

chatbots.title: Chatbots & Virtual Assistants
chatbots.short: 24/7 customer service with conversational AI that resolves, not just responds.
chatbots.description: We implement intelligent chatbots that understand your business context, resolve complex queries and escalate when needed. Integration with WhatsApp, web, Instagram and more.

automation.title: Business Process Automation
automation.short: Eliminate repetitive tasks and connect all your tools in intelligent workflows.
automation.description: We design and build automated workflows that connect your applications, eliminate manual tasks and reduce errors. From client onboarding to automated reports.

crm.title: AI-Powered CRM
crm.short: Your CRM working for you: automatic scoring, smart follow-up and predictions.
crm.description: We configure and optimize your CRM with AI layers: predictive lead scoring, follow-up automation, sentiment analysis and action recommendations.

marketing.title: AI Marketing Automation
marketing.short: Self-optimizing campaigns: email, social media and content powered by AI.
marketing.description: We implement AI-powered marketing automation for personalized email marketing, social media management, content generation and advanced audience segmentation.

analytics.title: Analytics & Business Intelligence
analytics.short: Data turned into decisions: intelligent dashboards and actionable predictions.
analytics.description: We build custom dashboards and business intelligence systems that transform your data into actionable insights with AI-based predictions.

custom.title: Custom AI Solutions
custom.short: Tailored AI for unique challenges: custom models, RAG, fine-tuning and more.
custom.description: We develop fully customized AI solutions: RAG systems with your documentation, fine-tuned models for your industry, AI APIs and specialized assistants.

audit.title: AI Audit & Assessment
audit.short: Discover exactly where AI can transform your business with a free audit.
audit.description: We analyze your business end-to-end to identify AI implementation opportunities with ROI estimation, prioritized roadmap and implementation plan.

training.title: Training & Workshops
training.short: Empower your team to leverage AI in their daily work.
training.description: Customized workshops and training programs so your team masters AI tools relevant to their role, from ChatGPT to industry-specific tools.

Audit.title: Free AI Audit
Audit.subtitle: Discover how artificial intelligence can transform your business
Audit.description: In less than 48 hours you'll receive a personalized report with concrete improvement opportunities, ROI estimation and a prioritized action plan.

form.success: Request sent! We'll contact you within 48 hours.

HowItWorks.title: How We Work
HowItWorks.subtitle: A simple process for extraordinary results

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We analyze your business, processes and goals to identify opportunities.

audit.title: Audit
audit.description: We evaluate each area and quantify the potential impact of AI.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: We build and integrate solutions prioritized by impact and feasibility.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: We optimize, measure results and scale what works.

About.title: About NexaFlow AI
About.subtitle: Your strategic partner in digital transformation with AI
About.mission: Our mission is to democratize access to artificial intelligence so any business can multiply its results.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always at the forefront of the latest AI tools and techniques.

results.title: Results
results.description: Every implementation is measured by its real impact on your business.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: No smoke, no unnecessary jargon. We explain everything clearly.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We're not vendors, we're your external AI technology team.

Contact.title: Let's Talk
Contact.subtitle: We're ready to supercharge your business

Footer.description: We transform businesses with artificial intelligence. Automation, chatbots, CRM and custom AI solutions.
